summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from May 1, 2015, to May 31, 2015. It details various debits and credits, including payments to ADP for payroll and taxes, as well as transfers to other accounts. The document highlights the financial activities associated with the account during this period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $148,367.95 on May 1, 2015.
Significant transactions included a transfer of $250,000.00 on May 15, 2015.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2015, was $249,999.08.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made for payroll and tax services throughout the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
